body_html: The original Spectral Norm paper doesn't backprop through the left and right singular vectors, so didn't we. It's also unclear why detaching before the loop was reasonable because the _u vector is cached and reused.
body_text: The original Spectral Norm paper doesn't backprop through the left and right singular vectors, so didn't we. It's also unclear why detaching before the loop was reasonable because the _u vector is cached and reused.
body: The original Spectral Norm paper doesn't backprop through the left and right singular vectors, so didn't we. It's also unclear why detaching before the loop was reasonable because the _u vector is cached and reused.
